name: Korea
startIntroPart1: The ultimate nation that thrived in prehistoric times.
startIntroPart2: Guide your nation to a fruitful future
declaringWar: Resistance is futile! Prepare to be assimilated!
defeated: How is it possible that those Apes hurt us? Great Dangun will take care of them.
introduction: As the superior race, you are not worthy of our attention.
neutralNo: I just got a call from Mr sky, he said that you are stupid.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniques: City-State Influence recovers at twice the normal rate
City-State territory always counts as friendly territory
Great General provides double combat bonus
[+20]% Production when constructing [All] wonders [in all cities]
Gain an extra spy <upon entering the [Renaissance era]>
[+25]% Production towards any buildings that already exist in the Capital
[-50]% Gold cost of acquiring tiles [in all cities]
No damage penalty for wounded units <for [non-[Air]] units>
When conquering an encampment, earn [25] Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit <with [67]% chance>
When defeating a [{Barbarian} {Water}] unit, earn [25] Gold and recruit it <with [50]% chance>
[+2 Science] from every specialist [in all cities]
Receive a tech boost when scientific buildings/wonders are built in capital
All units move through Forest and Jungle Tiles in friendly territory as if they have roads. These tiles can be used to establish City Connections upon researching the Wheel.
Enables embarkation for land units <starting from the [Ancient era]> <Suppress warning [*contains a conditional on a unit movement unique*]>
Military Units gifted from City-States start with [+10] XP
[+100 Gold] for discovering a Natural Wonder (bonus enhanced to [+500 Gold] if first to discover it)
[+1 Happiness] for every known Natural Wonder
Receive triple Gold from Barbarian encampments and pillaging Cities
Enables [All] units to enter ocean tiles <starting from the [Ancient era]>
Units ignore terrain costs when moving into any tile with Hills
No Maintenance costs for improvements in [Hill] tiles
[1] Movement point cost to disembark <for [All] units>
No movement cost to pillage <for [Melee] units>
Cities are razed [2] times as fast
Retain [50]% of the happiness from a luxury after the last copy has been traded away
Gain [90] Influence with a [Great Person] gift to a City-State
When declaring friendship, both parties gain a [10]% boost to great person generation
Can spend Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your ally for [5] turns.
Gain a free [Harbor] [in all coastal cities]
Land units may cross [Mountain] tiles after the first [Great General] is earned
Comment [Units ending their turn on [Mountain] tiles take [50] damage]
May choose [50] additional belief(s) of any type when [founding] a religion
[+1 Faith] [in all cities] <with [1] to [2] neighboring [{unimproved} {Forest}] tiles>
[+2 Faith] [in all cities] <with [3] to [6] neighboring [{unimproved} {Forest}] tiles>
[+20]% Strength <when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than you>
Receive a free Great Person at the end of every [Maya Long Count calendar cycle] (every 394 years), after researching [Theology]. Each bonus person can only be chosen once.
Once The Long Count activates, the year on the world screen displays as the traditional Mayan Long Count.
Land units may cross [Mountain] tiles after the first [Great Engineer] is earned
No Maintenance costs for improvements in [Mountain] tiles
[+50]% Production when constructing [Nuclear Missile] units [in all cities]
May choose [5] additional [Founder] beliefs when [founding] a religion
No Maintenance costs for improvements in [Forest] tiles
No Maintenance costs for improvements in [Jungle] tiles
[+2 Culture] from every [Scientist] <during a Golden Age>
[+2 Science] from every [Artist] <during a Golden Age>
[+20]% Strength <when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than you>
Provides the cheapest [Faith] building in your first [4] cities for free
[+50 Culture] whenever a Great Person is expended
[Faith] cost of purchasing items in cities [-25]%
[-33]% Culture cost of natural border growth [in all cities connected to capital]
May not generate great prophet equivalents naturally
[+15]% Production when constructing [Science] buildings [in all cities]
[+15]% Production when constructing [Culture] buildings [in all cities]
All newly-trained [Mounted] units [in all cities] receive the [Shock I] promotion
Earn [100]% of killed [Military] unit's [Strength] as [Faith] <when fighting in [Enemy Land] tiles>
Earn [100]% of killed [Military] unit's [Strength] as [Culture] <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles>
May buy [Great Artist] units for [1000] [Faith] [in all cities in which the majority religion is a major religion] at an increasing price ([500]) <starting from the [Renaissance era]>
May buy [Great Engineer] units for [1000] [Faith] [in all cities in which the majority religion is a major religion] at an increasing price ([500]) <starting from the [Renaissance era]>
May buy [Great General] units for [1000] [Faith] [in all cities in which the majority religion is a major religion] at an increasing price ([500]) <starting from the [Renaissance era]>
May buy [Great Merchant] units for [1000] [Faith] [in all cities in which the majority religion is a major religion] at an increasing price ([500]) <starting from the [Renaissance era]>
May buy [Great Scientist] units for [1000] [Faith] [in all cities in which the majority religion is a major religion] at an increasing price ([500]) <starting from the [Renaissance era]>
[+2 Science] from every specialist [in all cities]
Receive a tech boost when scientific buildings/wonders are built in capital
[+1 Food] from every [Farm] <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Academy] tiles>
[+1 Science] from every [Mine] <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Academy] tiles>

name: China
startIntroPart1: Heaven itself bends before your beauty, Empress Wu Zetian, ruler of eternal China! You lead one of the oldest and greatest civilization of humanity. In your time, China stood at the forefront of science and technology, bringing the world such contributions as gunpowder, the printing press, and the world of Confucius, and this, long before the rest of the world was mature enough to make the same discoveries!
startIntroPart2: Great Queen, can you make China prevail again, using your divine intelligence and beauty? China stands for greatness, and all its enemies will be dazzled soon enough! Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: You won't ever be able to bother me again. Go meet Yama.
attacked: Fool! I will disembowel you all!
defeated: You have proven to be a cunning and competent adversary. I congratulate you on your victory.
introduction: Greetings, I am Empress Wu Zetian. China desires peace and development. You leave us alone, we'll leave you alone.
tradeRequest: My friend, do you think you can accept this request?
uniques: Great General provides double combat bonus

name: Japan
startIntroPart1: Lord Oda Nobunaga, ruler of Japan, the land of the Rising Sun is at your command! Through history, Japanese people lived and died with honor, proud of their rich culture of arts and letters. Years of bloody civil wars, invasions of foreign powers, wealth but also great poverty, have never altered the strong will of the Rising Sun island, as the Bushido spirit has imbued the fields of battle and the Japanese society for millenia. At the end of the 19th century, under foreign influence, your people took the path of modernity, and in a few decades, made of Japan a land of technological innovation and powerful industry, with which only few nations can compete.
startIntroPart2: O great daimyo, will you take on your hands the Japan destiny, for the Rising Sun to light the world? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: I hereby inform you of our intention to wipe out your civilization from this world.
attacked: Pitiful fool! Now we shall destroy you!
defeated: You were much wiser than I thought.
introduction: We hope for a fair and just relationship with you, who are renowned for military bravery.
tradeRequest: I would be grateful if you agreed on the following proposal.
uniques: No damage penalty for wounded units <for [non-[Air]] units>

name: Gailand
startIntroPart1: Joe Gai has decided to found a new nation for the greater sake of humanity
startIntroPart2: You don't have to worry, Joe will carry
afterPeace: okok peace. we are friends and are happy
